name: TerraHunt Sales Autopilot - TEST VERSION copy

parameters.content:
## Submit Website Form
**Customer fills out and submits form from website including Stripe payment**

[Test Website Link](https://autopilot.terrahunt.cz/)

## Edit Fields
**Reformatting items from Webhook so that Airtable accepts them**

## Airtable Base Post Created
**All items are saved for billing, pairing with Stripe, and client game parameters, according to which the event is then launched on the server. 
ITEM FOR PAIRING - Payment ID**

[Base link](https://airtable.com/appRH0mydJXkeEQIJ/tblWfEAxc3ARNesff/viww9GaFA6BbtK3xk?blocks=hide)

## Stripe Payment Succeeded Webhook
**If Payment Succeeded**  webhook is sent - PAYMENT ID INCLUDED  - need to be paired with Airtable post

## Stripe-Airtable Pairing
**If Payment Succeeded** change status of payment in Airtable

## Pairing check
**If Yes** Continue ! - **If no** Send a message!

## Additional Card Information
**Card brand, last 4 digits**
